answers.answer: Hi and thanks for using the forum.You really should get in touch with your mom's doctor.  4 days is a long time to be throwing up and I would be worried that this is more than just a virus.  Also, at her age, dehydration can happen very quickly and can cause serious problems for her.  Finally, her blood sugars can really get out of control quickly in this type of scenario, so make sure you have her seen by her doctor.  Good luck.BridgetPS- I think you may be thinking of cherry red lips that are commonly seen with carbon monoxide poisoning
